Package com.example.myapplication

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountActivity
    Class responsible for Account View activity,where the user can see his/her email , name ,mobile phone and address.
    BasketActivity
    When the basket is created for the user it will select all the data from the orders table and represent it on a table.
    BasketActivityTest
    Testing the basket activity
    CategoryActivity
    It selects uniquely all the product categories from the database.This mAdapter must have a different structure On creation of this instance we must update the local database of Android
    DrawActivity
    Opening the drawing activity for the user to draw
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    GetProducts
    Fetch the products from the local mysqllite the data.
    ItemsActivity
    Class responsible for showing the item in a list adapter
    LoginActivity
    Login Activity for the user.
    MapActivity
    Class responsible for showing a map to the user.
    MeetingActivity
    Class repsonsible for the meeting activity ,where the user can select a date and time and send them to the database
    Navigation
    Throught this class many other classes inherit due to the fact that the drawer layout is inside this class.
    NetworkConfigure
    All the urls of the security end point.
    OneItemActivity
    Specific every item with its details is shown on the screen for purchasing purposes.
    PaintView
    Class responsible for painting
    RegisterActivity
    Class for the register activity The user must enter full name , password , email ,mobile and address
    SendActivity
    Class for sending email activity.
    SessionManager
    Class responsible for manager session and other information found as properties of this class.
    SqlManager
    Class for handling data in sql lite embedded on android
    StartController
    Extends application -> first class before any activity
    UploadActivity
    Class responsible for uploading a photograph
